sentences.sContent: During dry place, keep within the new air circulation, avoid rain and insolate, also can use some detergent to remove odor.
sentences.sContent_eng: During dry place, keep within the new air circulation, avoid rain and insolate, also can use some detergent to remove odor.
sentences.sCn: 在晾置期间，要保持新居内空气的流通，避免雨淋及曝晒，还可采用一些去除气味的清洁剂。

phrases.pCn: 中性洗涤剂，中性去污剂

remMethod.val: de(分离) + terg(擦) + ent → 擦掉脏东西 → 清洁剂

words.tran: 洗净（作用）；去垢力，去垢性

trans.tranOther: a liquid or powder used for washing clothes, dishes etc
